snippet: It is possible that Peyton Hillis, who rushed for 1,177 yards for the Browns three seasons ago, will see time as early as Monday night’s game against the Vikings.
abstract: NFL Roundup; New York Giants sign free-agent running back Peyton Hills; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: It is possible that Peyton Hillis, who rushed for 1,177 yards for the Browns three seasons ago, will see time as early as Monday night’s game against the Vikings.

headline.main: Thin at Running Back, the Giants Sign Hillis
headline.print_headline: Thin at Running Back, The Giants Sign Hillis
